dimensions.label: Communication Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin communicate with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will communicate clearly and straightforwardly, stating opinions without hesitation or sugar-coating.
Your FarTwin will communicate tactfully and considerately, carefully choosing words to maintain harmony.

dimensions.label: Social Interactions
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin interact with others in social situations?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be highly energetic and engaging, actively seeking out social interactions.
Your FarTwin will be more cautious in social situations, preferring to observe before participating.

dimensions.label: Problem Solving
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach problem-solving?

options.description: Your FarTwin will use logical and methodical approaches to analyze problems.
Your FarTwin will rely on instinct and creative thinking to find solutions.

dimensions.label: Time Management
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin prioritize tasks and manage time?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be highly organized and focused, maximizing productivity.
Your FarTwin will have a more flexible approach to time management, allowing for flexibility.

dimensions.label: Writing Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin express themselves in writing?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be direct and to-the-point in their written communication.
Your FarTwin will use vivid language to paint a picture with words.

dimensions.label: Creative Expression
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin express their creativity?

options.description: Your FarTwin will have a strong visual imagination and enjoy artistic expression.
Your FarTwin will focus on practical applications of creativity, such as problem-solving.

dimensions.label: Achievement Motivation
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach achievement and competition?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be driven to succeed and win, often at the expense of others.
Your FarTwin will prioritize teamwork and cooperation over individual achievement.

dimensions.label: Risk Tolerance
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach risk and uncertainty?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be drawn to high-risk activities for the thrill of it.
Your FarTwin will approach risk with caution, preferring stability and security.
